meanings.definition: The quality or state of being active.
meanings.sent1: Her activenesses in sports make her a great team player.
meanings.sent2: The activenesses of the children at the playground was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The activenesses of the puppy chasing its tail was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: The activenesses of the city streets never seemed to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The activenesses of the volcano could be felt miles away.

meanings.definition: The capacity for vigorous activity; energy.
meanings.sent1: The activenesses of the cheetah allowed it to sprint at incredible speeds.
meanings.sent2: After a good night's sleep, she woke up with renewed activenesses.
meanings.sent3: The activenesses of the squirrel gathering nuts was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The activenesses of the storm could be felt in the howling winds.
meanings.sent5: The activenesses of the sun's rays warmed the earth below.
